dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3829615W] Official complaint regarding www.iecromania.eu 216.127.80.
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, April 13, 2007 12:19 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3829615W] Official complaint regarding www.iecromania.eu 216.127.80.137 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Official complaint regarding www.iecromania.eu 216.127.80.137 Added by system at Thursday, Apr 12 2007 04:15 pm X-MailFrom: s.gabbutt@iecuk.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Apr 12 16:15:25 2007 Received: (qmail 10731 invoked by alias); 12 Apr 2007 21:15:25 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 10728 invoked from network); 12 Apr 2007 21:15:25 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Apr 2007 21:15:25 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 12 Apr 2007 16:15:25 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 12 Apr 2007 16:15:24 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1176412518-18783-471-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from yankee.rb.xcalibre.co.uk (yankee.rb.xcalibre.co.uk [217.8.240.35]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id F33147E946 for ; Thu, 12 Apr 2007 16:15:23 -0500 (CDT) Envelope-to: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from user-5af0e26f.wfd96.dsl.pol.co.uk ([90.240.226.111] helo=Stephen) by yankee.rb.xcalibre.co.uk with esmtp (Exim 4.53) id 1Hc6dF-0001Ob-9x for abuse@ev1servers.net; Thu, 12 Apr 2007 22:15:06 +0100 Reply-To: From: "Stephen Gabbutt" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Official complaint regarding www.iecromania.eu 216.127.80.137 Subject: Official complaint regarding www.iecromania.eu 216.127.80.137 Date: Thu, 12 Apr 2007 22:15:41 +0100 Organization: I.E.C. Ltd Message-ID: <000d01c77d47$ba146fc0$a501a8c0@Stephen> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_000E_01C77D50.1BDB48C0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: Acd9R7lCdW7HlJUkSO6kirrCoQbIzQ== X-Whoson-Authenticated-User: iecpop2 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: s.gabbutt@iecuk.co.uk X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Apr 2007 21:15:24.0605 (UTC) FILETIME=[AFA0CED0:01C77D47] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir / Madam I would like to officially complain about the following web site that you are currently hosting: http://www.iecromania.eu @ 216.127.80.137 The reasons for my complaint are as follows 1. The website advertises my company name, my company logo, and my company's services. However I.E.C. Registrars s.r.l Romania are not affiliated or connected to my business in any way 2. I have contacted the advertised fax number on the website twice on the 11th April 2007 and to date have not had a reply to my questions 3. I currently represent the global interests of Independent European Certification, who are accredited by the United Kingdom Accreditation Service (UKAS) and the International Register of Certificated Auditors (IRCA) both of which facts can be validated on the following independent websites: http://www.ukas.com/about_accreditation/accredited_bodies/certification_ body _schedules.asp http://www.irca.org/auditortrain/auditortrain_1_2_2.asp?tofield=A08577 &to_ref=&to_course_ref=&Search=Submit+Query 4. The above website states that I.E.C. Registrars s.r.l Romania are accredited with UKAS and IRCA however this information is not correct I would therefore request that this website is removed immediately. I shall be taking legal advice as to how to pursue this matter further With kind regards Stephen Gabbutt European Certification Manager Independent European Certification Ltd 42 A Knight Street Pinchbeck Spalding Lincolnshire United Kingdom PE11 3RB Tel : + 44 (0) 1775 722 728 Fax: +44 (0) 1775 719 846 Web: www.iecuk.co.uk MIME element (text/html)

Dear Sir / Madam

 

I would like to officially complain about the following web site that you are currently hosting:

 

http://www.iecromania.eu  @ 216.127.80.137

 

The reasons for my complaint are as follows

 

  1. The website advertises my company name, my company logo, and my company’s services. However I.E.C. Registrars s.r.l Romania are not affiliated or connected to my business in any way
  2. I have contacted the advertised fax number on the website twice on the 11th April 2007 and to date have not had a reply to my questions
  3. I currently represent the global interests of Independent European Certification, who are accredited by the United Kingdom Accreditation Service (UKAS) and the International Register of Certificated Auditors (IRCA) both of which facts can be validated on the following independent websites:

 

         ;  http://www.ukas.com/about_accreditation/accred ited_bodies/certification_body_schedules.asp

         ;  http://www. irca.org/auditortrain/auditortrain_1_2_2.asp?tofield=A08577&to_ref=& amp;to_course_ref=&Search=Submit+Query< /p>

 

  1. The above website states that I.E.C. Registrars s.r.l Romania are accredited with UKAS and IRCA however this information is not correct

 

I would therefore request that this website is removed immediately. I shall be taking legal advice as to how to pursue this matter further

 

With kind regards

 

Stephen Gabbutt

European Certification Manager

 

Independent European Certification Ltd

42 A Knight Street

Pinchbeck

Spalding

Lincolnshire

United Kingdom

PE11 3RB

 

Tel :  + 44 (0) 1775 722 728

Fax:  +44 (0) 1775 719 846

Web: www.iecuk.co.uk

 

MIME element (text/plain)
